items.title: Gaza City will be razed if Hamas does not agree our terms, Israel minister says
items.description: Hamas should disarm and release all Israeli hostages, Israel Katz says, as country prepares a massive attack on Gaza City.

items.title: Former Thai PM Thaksin acquitted in royal insult case
items.description: The former PM's lese majeste charge relates to an interview he did with a South Korean newspaper years ago.

items.title: Lil Nas X arrested and taken to hospital after wandering LA streets in underwear
items.description: The LAPD allege the singer "charged" at them and was placed under arrest on suspicion of battery.

items.title: WHO warns of risks of extreme heat in the workplace
items.description: Workers, employers and governments need to adapt to a more extreme climate, the organisation says.

items.title: Beijing opposes 'bully' US for 50% tariffs on India
items.description: China's ambassador to India Xu Feihong says Beijing "firmly opposes" Washington's steep tariffs on Delhi.
